front.title: YANG Data Model for SFC Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (OAM)

abstract.t: This document defines YANG data model for Service Function Chaining (SFC Operations, Administration, and Maintenance). It derives from the basic YANG data model for Layer independent OAM Management defined in [I-D.ietf-lime-yang-connectionless-oam] with SFC technology specifics. It includes SFC OAM related configuration and state data.
